title: Officers moved from serious crime to clean up Met Police
description: About 90 officers have moved from serious crime and counter-terror teams to investigate police wrongdoing.

description: Proposals to alter the structure of domestic cricket are "dead in the water", says England and Wales Cricket Board chief executive Richard Gould.
